Articles.Content:
Have you ever been pissed off by other autopilots which tried to turn the plane using just rudder without rolling the plane?

Have you ever been pissed off by other autopilots which tried to hold constant heading with rudder without neutralizing the roll?

Welcome to the All-new Spurrry Spaceplane Autopilot

A new autopilot plugin built around spaceplane. The project is named in honor of Sperry SP-77 autopilot used on early 737, which is the ultimate goal of my project. (Hmmm... Maybe we could implement a proper FMC with LNAV and VNAV for KSP Hmmm...) Right now, the project only have a roll and pitch knob, much like the autopilot on the B377. (And the altitude hold function is mostly broken.)

Just add


    MODULE
    {
        name = C005AP
    }

to your favorite part and put the dll in 

<KSPFolder>\GameData\<YourPart>\Plugins

DOWNLOAD

GItHub link.
